    • GetResource

      public GetResource​(int storageRow)
      Parameters:
      storageRow - the number of the storage row in which the resource should be added 1-3: first row, second row, third row 4: special deposit (leader card ability)

  • Method Details

    • checkAction

      public boolean checkAction​(MarketMarble marble, PlayerDashboard player, Storage tempStorage, java.util.ArrayList<CounterTop> tempArrayDeposit)
      Checks if the action is legal
      Overrides:
      checkAction in class AtomicMarketAction
      Parameters:
      marble - the marble from witch take a resource
      player - the player performing the action
      tempStorage - the storage copy updated during checks on different marbles, to perform controls without updating the real storage
      tempArrayDeposit - the deposit array copy updated during checks on different marbles, to perform controls without updating the real deposits
      Returns:
      true if the action is legal false if the action is illegal

      Parameters:
      marble - the marble to convert
      player - the player performing the action
      gameManager - gameManager
      Returns:
      true if ended correctly
